email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s (USD/ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any additional terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the rate. The best I can do is $48.50/ton, given the current market conditions. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and I can provide the full specs if needed. Let me know if this revised rate works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50/ton sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan and provide details on demurrage? Also, please send over the full vessel specs for our records. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! The laycan remains 15-20 October. Demurrage is set at $20,000/day (USD) after 72 hours of laytime. I’ve attached the full vessel specs for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks for your prompt responses. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve sent the contract to your email. Please review and let me know if there are any issues. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
